_sText:
Making this map was a real challenge, since Ace and myself are on Linux. We made this map only using this operation system and using Hammer through Wine.

This maps is a complex bomb scenario map intended to offers a different gameplay from the official ones. Indeed, this map is not as open as the official ones but there are a lot more possibilities.

In this map the layout will be generated randomly on each round in order to offer a more complex and original gameplay.

On the graphic side, this map was inspired by old school brush-work level-design such as Half Life. And we have put a particular attention to the optimization, thus this map can be played on a very low end computer with decent frame-rates.

Also a hand-made Navigation-Mesh is included in order to play with bots !

If you want to contact us in order to get the .vmf for educational or remix purposes you can check our E-M@ils in the .txt contained in the archive !
